install: whoami && echo $HOME && printenv && export PATH=$HOME/.local/share/pnpm:$PATH && export PNPM_HOME=$HOME/.local/share/pnpm && sudo apt-get install -y gh && echo "$(git remote get-url origin | sed 's/.*://; s/@.*//')" | gh auth login --with-token && pnpm install -g vibe-tools@latest && mkdir -p /home/ubuntu/.vibe-tools

terminals.name: doppler
terminals.command: doppler setup --project os --config dev_background_cursor && doppler secrets download --project os --config dev_background_cursor --no-file --format env > /home/ubuntu/.vibe-tools/.env
